page.title: 02NEW ROADS FOR OLD.
page.content: S.W. corner{O/S:480090.}This square is dominated by the intrusion of the M.11, which cuts diagonally from S.W. to N.E. The old field boundaries ; essential features of rural landscape for so long, have been severed by this road development & enforced changes on Hogg's Farm, & Foster Street Farm. One old field track runs through a tunnel laid beneath the motorway whilst another links across the 6 lane highway by means of a single-span ferro-concrete bridge for use by farm vehicles & animals. Grazing land,wheat & barley typify the farming pattern. A clay-pigeon shooting area is located at:{483094 }The S.E.corner has a small concentration engeering company currently developing the Roydon bypass.
